alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Butler County through 600 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elbing, or 6 miles northeast of Whitewater, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Potwin, Elbing, El Dorado Lake and El Dorado State Park. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 76 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
